title: API对接讨论
situation: Discussing API integration with the backend team. You need to align on request format and error handling.

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 我们的API用的是RESTful，返回格式是JSON。
turns.pinyin: Wǒmen de API yòng de shì RESTful, fǎnhuí géshì shì JSON.
turns.translation: Our API uses RESTful, response format is JSON.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 好的，有接口文档吗？Swagger或者OpenAPI都可以。
turns.pinyin: Hǎo de, yǒu jiēkǒu wéndàng ma? Swagger huòzhě OpenAPI dōu kěyǐ.
turns.translation: Got it. Do you have API docs? Swagger or OpenAPI is fine.
suggestions: 好的，有接口文档吗？Swagger或者OpenAPI都可以。

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 有的，文档里有每个endpoint的请求参数和响应结构。
turns.pinyin: Yǒu de, wéndàng lǐ yǒu měi ge endpoint de qǐngqiú cānshù hé xiǎngyìng jiégòu.
turns.translation: Yes, the doc has request params and response structure for each endpoint.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 错误码呢？比如401、500这些，我们前端要统一处理。
turns.pinyin: Cuòwù mǎ ne? Bǐrú 401、500 zhèxiē, wǒmen qiánduān yào tǒngyī chǔlǐ.
turns.translation: What about error codes? Like 401, 500 — we need to handle them consistently on the frontend.
suggestions: 错误码呢？比如401、500这些，我们前端要统一处理。
HTTP状态码和错误信息有定义吗？
